SQL.LOAD: SELECT record_type, company, invoice_number, invoice_date, attributes, claim_number, authorization_number, line_item_number, line_item_code, line_item_description, amount, entire_record, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, invoice_load_wrk_id FROM elp_invoice_load_wrk WHERE invoice_load_wrk_id = :invoice_load_wrk_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_invoice_load_wrk SET record_type = :record_type, company = :company, invoice_number = :invoice_number, invoice_date = :invoice_date, attributes = :attributes, claim_number = :claim_number, authorization_number = :authorization_number, line_item_number = :line_item_number, line_item_code = :line_item_code, line_item_description = :line_item_description, amount = :amount, entire_record = :entire_record, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE invoice_load_wrk_id = :invoice_load_wrk_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_invoice_load_wrk ( record_type, company, invoice_number, invoice_date, attributes, claim_number, authorization_number, line_item_number, line_item_code, line_item_description, amount, entire_record, created_by, invoice_load_wrk_id ) VALUES ( :record_type, :company, :invoice_number, :invoice_date, :attributes, :claim_number, :authorization_number, :line_item_number, :line_item_code, :line_item_description, :amount, :entire_record, :created_by, :invoice_load_wrk_id )
